languages.text: "Трон Святый... из чего сделан этот служитель Омниссии? Из адамантиума?... Проклятье!" {n}Абеляр хватается за голову, его глазной имплант захлебывается волной помех.{/n}
"By the Throne... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantine— Argh, blast it!" {n}Abelard clutches his head as his ocular implant is racked with a wave of interference.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Трон Святый... из чего сделан этот служитель Омниссии? Из адамантиума?... Проклятье!" {n}Абеляр хватается за голову, его глазной имплант захлебывается волной помех.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Throne almighty... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantium?"
"Throne almighty... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantium?"
"Throne Almighty... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantium?"
"Throne Almighty... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantium?"
"By the Throne... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantium— Argh, blast it!" {n}Abelard clutches his head as his ocular implant is racked with a wave of interference.{/n}
"By the Throne... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantium— Argh, blast it!" {n}Abelard clutches his head as his ocular implant is racked with a wave of interference.{/n}

languages.text: "Beim Thron ... Woraus besteht dieser Diener des Omnissiah? Adamant ... argh, verdammt!" {n}Abelard hält sich mit beiden Händen den Kopf, als sein Okularimplantat von einer Interferenzwelle gestört wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By the Throne... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantine— Argh, blast it!" {n}Abelard clutches his head as his ocular implant is racked with a wave of interference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Beim allmächtigen Thron ... Woraus besteht dieser Diener des Omnissiah? Adamantium?"

"Beim Thron ... Woraus besteht dieser Diener des Omnissiah? Adamant ... argh, verdammt!" {n}Abelard hält sich mit beiden Händen den Kopf, als sein Okularimplantat von einer Interferenzwelle gestört wird.{/n}

languages.text: « Par le Trône... Ce serviteur de l'Omnimessie serait-il fait d'adamantine ? Argh, malédiction ! » {n}Abélard se prend la tête à deux mains alors que son implant oculaire est assailli par une vague d'interférences.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By the Throne... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantine— Argh, blast it!" {n}Abelard clutches his head as his ocular implant is racked with a wave of interference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Par le Trône... Ce serviteur de l'Omnimessie serait-il fait d'adamantine ? Argh, malédiction ! » {n}Abélard se prend la tête à deux mains alors que son implant oculaire est assailli par une vague d'interférences.{/n}

languages.text: “黄金王座在上……欧姆尼塞亚的这位仆人是用什么做的？精金吗——啊，我的天！”{n}阿贝拉德捂住了头，他的眼部植入物似乎被某种电波干扰了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "By the Throne... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantine— Argh, blast it!" {n}Abelard clutches his head as his ocular implant is racked with a wave of interference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上……欧姆尼塞亚的这位仆人是用什么做的？精金吗？”

languages.text: 「全能なる王座よ…あの万機神の下僕は何でできているのです？アダマンチウムですか？うわっ、撃ち抜け！」{n}アベラルドは眼球インプラントが揺れるほどに動揺し、頭を抱えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "By the Throne... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantine— Argh, blast it!" {n}Abelard clutches his head as his ocular implant is racked with a wave of interference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「全能なるスローンよ…あの万機神の下僕は何でできているのです？アダマンチウムですか？うわっ、撃つんだ！」{n}アベラルドは眼球インプラントが揺れるぐらい動揺し、頭を抱えた。{/n}

languages.text: «Trono Todopoderoso... ¿De qué está hecho este sirviente del Omnissiah? ¿Adamantino? ¡Maldita sea!». {n}Abelard se lleva la mano al implante ocular, que se debate entre las interferencias.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By the Throne... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantine— Argh, blast it!" {n}Abelard clutches his head as his ocular implant is racked with a wave of interference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Trono Todopoderoso... ¿De qué está hecho este sirviente del Omnissiah? ¿Adamantio?».

languages.original_text: "By the Throne... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantium— Argh, blast it!" {n}Abelard clutches his head as his ocular implant is racked with a wave of interference.{/n}

languages.text: "Taht aşkına! Bu Hermesih'in hizmetkârı neyden yapılmış? Adamantinden mi? Ah! Kahretsin!" {n}Abelard, oküler implantı bir parazit dalgasıyla sarsılırken başını tutuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By the Throne... What is that servant of the Omnissiah made of? Adamantine— Argh, blast it!" {n}Abelard clutches his head as his ocular implant is racked with a wave of interference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Taht aşkına! Bu Hermesih'in hizmetkârı neyden yapılmış? Adamantinden mi? Ah! Kahretsin! {n}Abelard, oküler implantı bir parazit dalgasıyla sarsılırken başını tutuyor.{/n}
